header.title: About Us
header.subtitle: Specialists in Professional Car Light Modifications

story.title: Our Story
story.text1: We specialize in upgrading and customizing car headlights and taillights with high-quality lighting solutions. Our journey began with a simple goal: to help every car owner enhance their vehicle’s lighting performance and appearance with professional, reliable, and stylish modifications.
story.text2: Over the years, we’ve worked on hundreds of vehicles across different brands and models, gaining deep expertise in Bi-LED projectors, DRLs, Angel Eyes, RGB systems, laser modules, thermal headlight opening and sealing, restoring clarity, and vapor-proof insulation. Every job we complete follows precise techniques to deliver the best results possible.

speed.title: Fast Execution
speed.desc: Professional work delivered quickly without affecting light quality or headlight integrity.

innovation.title: Custom Lighting Ideas
innovation.desc: Unique designs including Angel Eyes, DRL lines, RGB systems, projectors, and custom effects based on your vision.

team.title: Skilled Technicians
team.desc: Experienced specialists in headlight disassembly, thermal opening, sealing, wiring, and precision adjustments.

support.title: Warranty & After-Service
support.desc: We provide warranty on all work and offer follow-up support for any concerns after installation.

values.title: Our Values
items: Using premium-grade LEDs, projectors, and lighting components for powerful and reliable results.
Performing every step with high accuracy — from opening headlights to sealing and adjustment.
Prioritizing road safety by ensuring focused beams without dazzling other drivers.
Providing guaranteed work against moisture, low brightness, or installation defects.

footer.text: Stronger Light — Better Style — Guaranteed Quality

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: First website in Egypt specialized in car lighting modifications ( front and rear lights, headlights, and interior and exterior car lighting and others )
contact.whatsapp: Contact us for any questions via whatsapp
contact.youtube: Follow us for all new updates via our youtube channel

branding.title: Mod Your Ride – Unleash Your Car’s True Potential!
branding.description: We specialize in professional car light modification and upgrades. From standard headlights to powerful LED and Xenon setups, we enhance brightness, visibility, and overall vehicle style. Our mission is to boost night driving safety while giving your car a modern, standout look. Whether you want a sporty vibe or a premium lighting upgrade, we provide high-quality results with original materials.
